meanings.definition: The state or quality of being eminent.
meanings.sent1: Her eminency in the field of science is widely recognized.
meanings.sent2: The professor's eminency in teaching makes her a role model for many students.
meanings.sent3: Despite his eminency in chess, he still manages to lose to his younger brother.
meanings.sent4: The eminency of the mountain peak was breathtaking against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The eminency of her leadership shone brightly during the crisis.

meanings.definition: A position of great distinction or superiority.
meanings.sent1: The eminency of the CEO is evident in the success of the company.
meanings.sent2: He reached the eminency of his career after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The eminency of the cake baker was challenged by a new competitor in town.
meanings.sent4: The eminency of the sun in the sky marked the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The eminency of the queen's throne was adorned with jewels and gold.
